Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Christian Delgado
Reviews.Content: Llego en perfecto estado tal cual se describio usado muy bueno de la operadora AT&T; y 3G para bandas 1,2,5,lo recomiendo...

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE!
Reviews.Author: Bruno, Venezuela
Reviews.Content: RAPIDA ENTREGA Y EL TELEFONO ESTA EN MEJORES CONDICIONES DE LO QUE ESPERABA, COMO NUEVO! LO RECOMIENDO AMPLIAMENTE! SIN UN RASJUÑO NI DEFECTO!

Reviews.Title: Worst ourchase ever
Reviews.Author: kip
Reviews.Content: I bought this product in January thinking this would be my final phone i got!!! well the phone has so many problems..First off they told me it was brand new and had a warranty!!!Went to att service store they told me my warranty was out since november of last year and that it was refurbished!!!Also.. i was dropping calls and the phone was not sending any messages and people would get my messages in chinease or not at all!!The phone froze and never worked.Trackpad was aweful!!!!!!I would not reccomend this phone at all!!There were more problems but i cant write all of them because there were too many

Reviews.Title: excelente celular me encanto
Reviews.Author: omar ortiz
Reviews.Content: what I expected, the phone was a gift for my mom, I am delighted, thank you for sending the team quickly, a new computer, this perfect thanks, would return to buy units, is more I will record the name of the company I liked purchase, here in Venezuela that team works with any company, so if some Venezuelan reading this, I say buy with your eyes closed, I recommend

Reviews.Title: I would recommend if you want a used cel
Reviews.Author: Diosamarial- Venezuela
Reviews.Content: Arrived in good condition, but not formatting well, and he had pictures of his former owner, did not come in the box, do not know how long you have to use, the battery is not the originalLlego en buenas condiciones, pero no lo formateo bien, ya que tenia fotos de su antiguo dueño, no vino en su caja,No se cuanto tiempo tiene de uso, la bateria no es la original

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: SARA OYUELA HENRIQUEZ
Reviews.Content: Ok Recibido a tiempo y satisfactorio volveria a comprar con el mismo vendedor  pruebaloes una buena opcion de compra gracias

Reviews.Title: NEGATIVO
Reviews.Author: Lizeth
Reviews.Content: EL CELULAR ES REPOTENCIADO Y YO LO COMPRE COMO NUEVO. NO ME SIRVIO. TUVE UNA MALA EXPERIENCIA Y NO LO RECOMIENDO. NO COMPREN AQUI

Reviews.Title: Blackberry review
Reviews.Author: Christen J. Reimer "GAME SONIC"
Reviews.Content: This Blackberry is a great one that can do many stuff and has a nice QWERTY keyboard.  Great Blackberry overall!

Reviews.Title: it works in Venezuela 3G Movistar
Reviews.Author: Marielba Soto
Reviews.Content: this cellular works with 3G Movistar in Venezuela I really recommend it, 3G bands 1,2,5,6 (1900MHz) accepts OS 6.0 and BBM voice chat.

ProductInfo.Features:
Cellular Band - Quad-Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 Mhz
Cellular Band 3G - 850 / 1900 / 2100 Mhz
ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry Curve 3G 9300 Gray WiFi Unlocked GSM QuadBand Cell Phone
